website_summaries.verdict: A premium basketball bag that boasts a built-in mesh net compartment for convenient storage.
pros: Offers 2 external elasticized mesh pockets for water bottles, shoes and much more
Mesh basketball compartment neatly tucks away into a zippered compartment when not in use
Includes thick, soft foam back padding for added comfort and support
A great option for children ages 6 and up
cons: Bag does not hold a basketball tightly, and as a result, a basketball may fall out of the bag during transport

customer_reviews.title: Hella big, holds a lot but is not bulky ...
customer_reviews.text: Hella big, holds a lot but is not bulky.... I dont use it for sports. I use it for my work helmet... and I don't even have pull out the net... I can clip it under.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Hidden ball net is awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great bag... got it for my niece that plays soccer and it fits everything...and the ball net is awsome
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sports bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome for my boys basketball bag! They love it & their coaches loved them as well. (the net to hold the ball is on the bottom, you have to unzip it)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: We love the idea of this bag but the ball section ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the idea of this bag but the ball section of this bag isn’t tight and one (if not both) of the straps to hold the ball in comes loose and therefore the basketball falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived completely different than as pictured! There’s no mesh ball area at all. Actually awkward but can accommodate a full size ball. Just don’t bait and switch me
customer_reviews.author: KeniWoo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the mesh for the basketball as shown. Basketball has to be placed INSIDE bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Norris

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Using for basketball games, has held up good so far
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase i must say
customer_reviews.text: I use this during my Men's league.....Great purchase i must say.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my sons basketball items. And he can carry his ball if needed. Cool bag!
customer_reviews.author: NESTIEGO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves it. Won't use any other back pack. Good quality fabric!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Large storage inside, cant find the attachment to hold ball
customer_reviews.text: I think it's missing the net that holds the ball, I will look in pockets to see if I missed something. Large bag, fits our Saturday soccer needs between two kids and two fields. If it holds the soccer ball once I find the attachment I will change my review. Durable material and zipper a plus
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my boys
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Works great for my son’s basketball practice and games. Fits his size 13 shoes his uniform along with a basketball. My other son loves it for riding her s bike to play basketball at his friends house. He can take his ball and ride his bike. Pretty durable and not to big and bulky. Looking into buying another for my younger son.
customer_reviews.author: Gratefulanna

product_meta.title: Basketball Backpack - Soccer Laptop School Team Bag -Youth Ages 6 & Up
product_meta.description: Soccer Backpack - Laptop Basketball Backpack with Mesh net that pulls out of the zipper pocket AT THE BOTTOM of the bagThe spacious front storage compartment has a pocket for your smartphone, wallet or calculator etc. The larger back storage compartment has a security pocket for your laptop or tablet and plenty of space for notebooks, textbooks, sporting equipment or a change of clothes etc. The zipper for the biggest pouch is hidden and tucked away to help secure your belongings. The LLB is perfect for a Soccer / Futbol Ball or Football. Simply slide our lock through the zipper holes and use the set of keys to reopen. Comfortably carry your basketball or any other type of ball with strength on your back without crushing the contents of your backpack. The mesh compartment has newly designed reinforced strength to hold your basketball securely and as tight as possible. The mesh covering conveniently tucks away into a zippered compartment when not in use. Keep all of your smaller items in the convenient top zippered compartment. Great for your keys, pens, gum. Two elasticized mesh compartments that are perfect for water bottles or compact umbrellas. The headphone port in the main compartment lets you stay connected while hands-free. Thick padding on the back panel protects your laptop and keeps you comfortable. The wide, thick shoulder straps with mesh relieve pressure from your shoulders while keeping you cool. This lightweight stylish security backpack is perfect for any activity: Any sporting activity, hiking, camping, day trips, business, travel, school. Unisex style for both men and women. Handwash, hang dry.
feature_bullets: Soccer Backpack - Basketball Laptop Basketball Backpack with built-in (It Is Tucked Into A Separate Zipper at Bottom of Bag) mesh net compartment for a B-Ball Soccer Ball, Football, Helmet, Shoes, Lunch bag etc. The mesh compartment neatly tucks away into a zippered compartment when not in use. Backpack dimensions are:

-Internal compartments for your iPad, smartphone, wallet, calculator or keys inside the school bag. Two external elasticized mesh pockets for water bottles, shoes, etc. The laptop compartment comfortably fits a 16.4-inch laptop.
-Outlet for your headphones so you can listen to music and keep your device tucked away in your backpack.

-Thick soft foam back padding protects your laptop while proving you with additional comfort. Wide shoulder straps with thick padding and breathable mesh, relieves pressure off your shoulders and keep them cool.

-For Youth Ages 6 & up - Don't you remember when you were a kid and you enjoying showing people what sport you were extremely passionate about? Give your children a chance to connect with schoolmates and find something in common almost instantly with this revolutionary backpack
